mhrNumber.description: The MHR Number that uniquely identifies the registration.

username.description: Name of the user who created the registration. Empty string for legacy registrations.

statusType.description: The status of the registration. ACTIVE - registered; DRAFT; EXEMPT; HISTORICAL - cancelled.

path.description: The relative path for a GET request to retrieve an individual registration.

createDateTime.description: Generated by the system, the date and time the registration is created.

clientReferenceId.description: An optional client reference identifier associated with the registration. Provided to facilitate client tracking of MHR activity.

ownerNames.description: The names of one or more of the registration active owners, separated by a comma in the format first middle last.

inUserList.description: True if the base registration is already included in the account registrations list.
